classes.name: Yoga
classes.description: Yoga is a group of physical, mental, and spiritual practices or disciplines which originated in ancient India.

classes.name: Pilates
classes.description: Pilates is a physical fitness system developed in the early 20th century by Joseph Pilates, after whom it was named.

classes.name: Zumba
classes.description: Zumba is a Colombian fitness program created by Pietro Pérez in the 1990s, and is based on Latin dance and aerobics.

classes.name: Spinning
classes.description: Spinning is a form of indoor cycling, in which participants cycle to music in a group.
